long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows Shop&Save website's users to get a partial refund after their purchase from one of our partners shopping websites.

In order to benefits from this service:

- Create an account from Shop&Save website, or directly via this extension
- log into your account via the extension (One time process)
- Get a partial refund when shopping from one of our partners. You can check anytime the list of partners in the extension under "Shopping websites". 
- Your refunded amount will be available in your Shop&Save account, and it can be withdrew anytime once it reached 5$ or more.
